component.name: RetroArch
component.summary: Frontend for emulators, game engines and media players

screenshot.caption: RetroArch running the Nintendo Entertainment System
RetroArch running Sheep It Up on the Gameboy

description.p: RetroArch enables you to run classic games on a wide range of computers and consoles through its slick graphical interface. Settings are also unified so configuration is done once and for all.
